trans-unit.source: Describes the technical specifications and regulatory standards compliance information for the StorSimple hardware components.
trans-unit.target: Describes the technical specifications and regulatory standards compliance information for the StorSimple hardware components.

trans-unit.source: Technical specifications and compliance for the StorSimple device
trans-unit.target: Technical specifications and compliance for the StorSimple device

trans-unit.source: The hardware components of your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device adhere to the technical specifications and regulatory standards outlined in this article.
trans-unit.target: The hardware components of your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device adhere to the technical specifications and regulatory standards outlined in this article.

trans-unit.source: The technical specifications describe the Power and Cooling Modules (PCMs), disk drives, and enclosures.
trans-unit.target: The technical specifications describe the Power and Cooling Modules (PCMs), disk drives, and enclosures.

trans-unit.source: The compliance information covers such things as international standards, safety and emissions, and cabling.
trans-unit.target: The compliance information covers such things as international standards, safety and emissions, and cabling.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] For more information about the StorSimple device, download the [StorSimple 8000 Series Datasheet](http://www.microsoft.com/server-cloud/products/storsimple/resources.aspx).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] For more information about the StorSimple device, download the [StorSimple 8000 Series Datasheet](http://www.microsoft.com/server-cloud/products/storsimple/resources.aspx).

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple device has two 100-240V dual fan, SBB-compliant Power Cooling Modules (PCMs).
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple device has two 100-240V dual fan, SBB-compliant Power Cooling Modules (PCMs).

trans-unit.source: This provides a redundant power configuration.
trans-unit.target: This provides a redundant power configuration.

trans-unit.source: If a PCM fails, the device continues to operate normally on the other PCM until the failed module is replaced.
trans-unit.target: If a PCM fails, the device continues to operate normally on the other PCM until the failed module is replaced.

trans-unit.source: The EBOD enclosure uses a 580 W PCM, and primary enclosure uses a 764 W PCM.
trans-unit.target: The EBOD enclosure uses a 580 W PCM, and primary enclosure uses a 764 W PCM.

trans-unit.source: The following tables list the technical specifications associated with the PCMs.
trans-unit.target: The following tables list the technical specifications associated with the PCMs.

trans-unit.source: AC ON/OFF switch and four status indicator LEDs
trans-unit.target: AC ON/OFF switch and four status indicator LEDs

trans-unit.source: AC ON/OFF switch and six status indicator LEDs
trans-unit.target: AC ON/OFF switch and six status indicator LEDs

trans-unit.source: Axial cooling fans with variable fan speed control
trans-unit.target: Axial cooling fans with variable fan speed control

trans-unit.source: Axial cooling fans with variable fan speed control
trans-unit.target: Axial cooling fans with variable fan speed control

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the typical power consumption data (actual values may vary from the published) for the various models of StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the typical power consumption data (actual values may vary from the published) for the various models of StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Fans fast, drives idle, two PSUs powered
trans-unit.target: Fans fast, drives idle, two PSUs powered

trans-unit.source: Fans fast, drives idle, one PSU powered one idle
trans-unit.target: Fans fast, drives idle, one PSU powered one idle

trans-unit.source: Fans fast, drives accessing, two PSUs powered
trans-unit.target: Fans fast, drives accessing, two PSUs powered

trans-unit.source: Fans fast, drives accessing, one PSU powered one idle
trans-unit.target: Fans fast, drives accessing, one PSU powered one idle

trans-unit.source: Your StorSimple device supports up to 12 3.5-inch form factor Serial Attached SCSI (SAS) disk drives.
trans-unit.target: Your StorSimple device supports up to 12 3.5-inch form factor Serial Attached SCSI (SAS) disk drives.

trans-unit.source: The actual drives can be a mix of solid-state drives (SSDs) or hard disk drives (HDDs), depending on the product configuration.
trans-unit.target: The actual drives can be a mix of solid-state drives (SSDs) or hard disk drives (HDDs), depending on the product configuration.

trans-unit.source: The 12 disk drive slots are located in a 3 by 4 configuration in front of the enclosure.
trans-unit.target: The 12 disk drive slots are located in a 3 by 4 configuration in front of the enclosure.

trans-unit.source: The EBOD enclosure allows for additional storage for another 12 disk drives.
trans-unit.target: The EBOD enclosure allows for additional storage for another 12 disk drives.

trans-unit.source: The following tables list the various enclosure specifications for dimensions and weight.
trans-unit.target: The following tables list the various enclosure specifications for dimensions and weight.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the dimensions of the enclosure in millimeters and inches.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the dimensions of the enclosure in millimeters and inches.

trans-unit.source: Depth from front mounting flange to extremity of enclosure body
trans-unit.target: Depth from front mounting flange to extremity of enclosure body

trans-unit.source: Depth from operations panel to furthest extremity of enclosure
trans-unit.target: Depth from operations panel to furthest extremity of enclosure

trans-unit.source: Depth from mounting flange to furthest extremity of enclosure
trans-unit.target: Depth from mounting flange to furthest extremity of enclosure

trans-unit.source: Depending on the configuration, a fully loaded primary enclosure can weigh from 21 to 33 kgs and requires two persons to handle it.
trans-unit.target: Depending on the configuration, a fully loaded primary enclosure can weigh from 21 to 33 kgs and requires two persons to handle it.

trans-unit.source: This section lists the specifications related to the enclosure environment.
trans-unit.target: This section lists the specifications related to the enclosure environment.

trans-unit.source: The temperature, humidity, altitude, shock, vibration, orientation, safety, and Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC)are included in this category.
trans-unit.target: The temperature, humidity, altitude, shock, vibration, orientation, safety, and Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC)are included in this category.

trans-unit.source: Airflow, altitude, shock, vibration, orientation, safety, and EMC
trans-unit.target: Airflow, altitude, shock, vibration, orientation, safety, and EMC

trans-unit.source: System airflow is front to rear.
trans-unit.target: System airflow is front to rear.

trans-unit.source: System must be operated with a low-pressure, rear-exhaust installation.
trans-unit.target: System must be operated with a low-pressure, rear-exhaust installation.

trans-unit.source: Back pressure created by rack doors and obstacles should not exceed 5 pascals (0.5 mm water gauge).
trans-unit.target: Back pressure created by rack doors and obstacles should not exceed 5 pascals (0.5 mm water gauge).

trans-unit.source: -30 meters to 3045 meters (-100 feet to 10,000 feet) with maximum operating temperature de-rated by 5°C above 7000 feet.
trans-unit.target: -30 meters to 3045 meters (-100 feet to 10,000 feet) with maximum operating temperature de-rated by 5°C above 7000 feet.

trans-unit.source: -305 meters to 12,192 meters (-1,000 feet to 40,000 feet)
trans-unit.target: -305 meters to 12,192 meters (-1,000 feet to 40,000 feet)

trans-unit.source: To fit minimum 700 mm (31.50 inches) depth racks compliant with IEC 297
trans-unit.target: To fit minimum 700 mm (31.50 inches) depth racks compliant with IEC 297

trans-unit.source: Your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device complies with the following international standards:
trans-unit.target: Your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device complies with the following international standards:

trans-unit.source: Your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device meets the following safety ratings:
trans-unit.target: Your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device meets the following safety ratings:

trans-unit.source: System product type approval: UL, cUL, CE
trans-unit.target: System product type approval: UL, cUL, CE

trans-unit.source: Your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device meets the following EMC ratings.
trans-unit.target: Your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device meets the following EMC ratings.

trans-unit.source: The device is EMC compliant for conducted and radiated emissions levels.
trans-unit.target: The device is EMC compliant for conducted and radiated emissions levels.

trans-unit.source: Conducted emissions limit levels: CFR 47 Part 15B Class A EN55022 Class A CISPR Class A
trans-unit.target: Conducted emissions limit levels: CFR 47 Part 15B Class A EN55022 Class A CISPR Class A

trans-unit.source: Radiated emissions limit levels: CFR 47 Part 15B Class A EN55022 Class A CISPR Class A
trans-unit.target: Radiated emissions limit levels: CFR 47 Part 15B Class A EN55022 Class A CISPR Class A

trans-unit.source: The plug and the complete power cord assembly must meet the standards appropriate for the country in which the device is being used, and they must have safety approvals that are acceptable in that country.
trans-unit.target: The plug and the complete power cord assembly must meet the standards appropriate for the country in which the device is being used, and they must have safety approvals that are acceptable in that country.

trans-unit.source: The following tables list standards for the USA and Europe.
trans-unit.target: The following tables list standards for the USA and Europe.

trans-unit.source: AC power cords - USA (must be NRTL listed)
trans-unit.target: AC power cords - USA (must be NRTL listed)

trans-unit.source: SV or SVT, 18 AWG minimum, 3 conductor, 2.0 meters maximum length
trans-unit.target: SV or SVT, 18 AWG minimum, 3 conductor, 2.0 meters maximum length

trans-unit.source: NEMA 5-15P grounding-type attachment plug rated 120 V, 10 A; or IEC 320 C14, 250 V, 10 A
trans-unit.target: NEMA 5-15P grounding-type attachment plug rated 120 V, 10 A; or IEC 320 C14, 250 V, 10 A

trans-unit.source: For the 10 GbE network interfaces, DATA 2 and DATA 3, refer to the [list of supported network cables and modules](storsimple-supported-hardware-for-10-gbe-network-interfaces.md).
trans-unit.target: For the 10 GbE network interfaces, DATA 2 and DATA 3, refer to the [list of supported network cables and modules](storsimple-supported-hardware-for-10-gbe-network-interfaces.md).
